{"blocks":[{"key":"dqmhe","text":"Prepare an ice bucket with ice and 50 ml falcon tubes with   HBS. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":59,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ereoo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"35-45","error":false,"guid":"A9DAC2F051A611EC88ECB1ADDEDB1365","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"brkdu","text":"Euthanize the tumor-bearing mouse and extract the tumor. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7lp4j","text":"Blot the tumor on a Kim-wipe to get rid of excess blood.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ass4n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4g2o","text":"Weigh the tumor and note the weight. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dl5hk","text":" Place the fresh tumor tissue in a falcon tube containing   HBS. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cka1o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"35-45","error":false,"guid":"76CAB5A051A611EC88ECB1ADDEDB1365","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ov35","text":"Transfer the tissue from the falcon tube into the petri dish containing HBS. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3qi3t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9pt0i","text":"Prepare a petri dish containing fresh HBS and place it on ice. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cjpd9","text":"Wash tumor multiple times with   HBS and remove excess HBS. Repeat this process two more times. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"atp2o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"A9E383E0CB0F11EBA905874AB73E6626","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6btit","text":"Mince the tumor with scissors or scalpels in the petri dish. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"16pac","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"autn3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":1,"offset":35,"style":"sup"}],"key":"b6i3h","text":"For larger tissue (larger than 1 cm3), use multiple rounds of mincing","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dljiv","text":"Add digestion medium to the petri dish containing tumor tissue and add enough volume to thoroughly cover the entire tumor. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9q4n2","text":"Place the petri dish in an incubator at   over  -   hrs.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":47,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cqlua","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"18shi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bspao","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"FF95D6D0CB0F11EBA905874AB73E6626","id":0,"label":"95% air/5% CO2","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"0F89DAA0CB1011EBA905874AB73E6626","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":14400,"guid":"025E1E90CB1011EBA905874AB73E6626","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bubng","text":"Vigorously mix the tissue every 10-15 minutes using a pipette to aid dissociation. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6d68t","text":"Periodically assess the digestion under the microscope and stop once small clusters or clumps of cells are released from the tissue and before complete digestion to single cells occurs. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6iclu","text":"Discard the supernatant and incubate the digested tissue with    Red Cell Lysis Buffer for  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":91,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a8l28","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"DC1FAF10520911ECB79E3321BCD05BC6","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"504D4A90CB1011EBA905874AB73E6626","id":0,"label":"mins","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cs1cn","text":"Pass the above solution containing tumor cells through a 70 um filter and collect the solution containing tumor cells that passed through the filter in a fresh 50 ml falcon tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1mp2s","text":"Pass the above solution containing tumor cells through a 40 um filter and collect the cells that passed through the filter in a fresh 50 ml falcon tube.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5kriu","text":"Centrifuge the solution containing tumor cells at   for 5 mins. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8nvb6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"151i4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"300","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A0F8FE80CB1011EBA905874AB73E6626","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"crken","text":"Perform Trypan Blue dye exclusion test and note the live and total cell count. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dmcho","text":"Transfer the falcon tube into a BSL2 hood. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ujof","text":"Discard the supernatant and resuspend the cell pellet in fresh DMEM prepared in step 2.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ftdvh","text":"Prepare cryogenic vials with    of    live cells and    of DMSO per cryovial. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":35,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9uogd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"900","error":false,"guid":"80EFCBF051A711EC88ECB1ADDEDB1365","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"94D8899051A711EC88ECB1ADDEDB1365","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1814}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"A28BEC3051A711EC88ECB1ADDEDB1365","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"44f5g","text":"Place the prepared cryovials in a freezing container and place the container in    freezer for 24 hours.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":80,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e1v62","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"FB3D4E5051A711EC88ECB1ADDEDB1365","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"co53f","text":"After 24 hours, transfer the cryovials into liquid nitrogen storage for long-term storage. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5jv9f","text":"Discard the supernatant and resuspend the cell pellet in   fresh DMEM prepared in step 2.
